DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find two-way texting platform use adjunct tool breastfeed peer counselor improve breastfeed behavior among woman enrol WIC program Connecticut . The hypothesis study provide additional information support text message start pregnancy continue birth child increase exclusive breastfeeding rate first six month life .
DOC.brief_title: LATCH : Lactation Advice Thru Texting Can Help
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman > 18 year Prenatal intention breastfeed Prenatal enrollment < 28 week gestation Have unlimited text message cell phone plan Knows send text message 5th grade literacy level Lack fluency either English Spanish Infant born premature ( < 37 week ) > 3 day NICU Any major maternalnewborn medical problem affect breastfeed Birth weight < 5lbs
